Use the Pen to Bless the Cause.--Let men and women who have a burden to produce books, work to bless the cause of God by the use of their pens. Let them work, and if they have an income 
                                                                           166
from their work, let them make use of that income to do their part in uplifting the standard of truth where God shall direct. Let them seek counsel from God. Let them believe the promise of Christ that He will send the Comforter to teach them all things and bring all things to their remembrance.--Special Instruction Regarding Royalties, p. 18. (1899.)
